thread.title: Ranveer Shorey feels India should get over with corporal punishment
thread.title_full: Ranveer Shorey feels India should get over with corporal punishment

title: Ranveer Shorey feels India should get over with corporal punishment
text: Ranveer Shorey feels India should get over with corporal punishment Thursday, 22 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Bollywood actor Ranveer Shorey, who will be seen in 'Titli', feels that India should be done away with corporal punishment.
